meanings.definition: The study of proteins and their structures, functions, and interactions within a biological system.
meanings.sent1: In proteomics, scientists examine how proteins work in living things.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use proteomics to understand how different proteins function in the body.
meanings.sent3: The proteomics class was so interesting that even the lab mice wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: Exploring proteomics is like unraveling a complex puzzle of biological molecules.
meanings.sent5: Through proteomics, we can visualize the intricate dance of proteins within cells.

meanings.definition: The analysis of the entire set of proteins produced by a cell, tissue, or organism.
meanings.sent1: Proteomics helps scientists identify all the proteins made by a living thing.
meanings.sent2: The lab is equipped with advanced tools for proteomics research.
meanings.sent3: When the microscope sneezed, it accidentally revealed the secrets of proteomics!
meanings.sent4: The field of proteomics is like a treasure hunt for hidden biological gems.
meanings.sent5: In the world of proteomics, each protein tells a unique story about life.
